headline: Progress Rail and Wabtec Reach a Settlement in Antitrust Case
summary: ALBERTVILLE, Ala. & PITTSBURGH, February 26, 2026--Progress Rail, a Caterpillar company, and Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today that the two parties have reached a settlement in Progress Rail v. Wabtec. The parties agree that this settlement is best for both companies, customers, and consumers, and the prospect of additional litigation is not in anyone’s interest. There is no admission of liability. The two companies acknowledge that they have been and remain suppliers of long-haul f

headline: CoreCivic Stock Down This Past Year, but One Fund Took a $5 Million Stake Amid 26% Revenue Surge
summary: CoreCivic manages correctional and reentry facilities across the U.S., providing outsourced solutions for government agencies.
